Vanishing Cut.name: Vanishing Cut
Vanishing Cut.flavor: Your attack slashes the foe, but before it can respond, you disappear into swirling darkness.
Vanishing Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target until the end of your next turn

Blinding Assailant.name: Blinding Assailant
Blinding Assailant.flavor: You strike and dance away, eluding a foeâ€™s counterattacks even as you set up your next strike.
Blinding Assailant.onHit: 3[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you become invisible to the target (save ends).
Blinding Assailant.effect: You can shift 1 square. Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target moves or shifts while it is adjacent to you, it takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, and you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Gloaming Shroud.name: Gloaming Shroud
Gloaming Shroud.flavor: Light flees when shadows envelop you to whisk you to safety.
Gloaming Shroud.effect: You shift 3 squares and gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
